title: Electrolux Refrigerator Door Shelf Bin
description: Electrolux Refrigerator Door Shelf Bin ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 199 Reviews PartSelect Number PS429871 Manufacturer Part Number 240338001 This manufacturer-approved Refrigerator Door Shelf Bin is made of white plastic and is easy to install. It is used to hold heavier items in the fridge, and you'll be able to visually see if the part is broken. This particular shelf attaches to the fridge door and is designed for the UPPER shelf. You can check if this model is right for your appliance by checking your user manual and model number. This model is just over 26" wide, just over 4" tall and just over 7" deep - front to back. This is a simple repair that requires only that you snap the old part out of place and snap the new one into place.

installationInstructions.author: Connie from Franklin, IN
installationInstructions.title: grandkids had broken the top and middle shelf bins in my refrigerator door
installationInstructions.content: I simply snapped the proper pieces in place. It was sooo easy!
